publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1695 Alex Johnstone: SGF Healthy Living Programme—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Grocers Federation (SGF) on the success of the Healthy Living Programme launched in 2004 with the support of the previous administration and which continues to have Scottish Government backing; recognises the importance of the programme in improving the availability of healthier food options to communities through the local convenience store sector; notes that convenience stores are becoming the main focus for many low income areas where car ownership is below the national average; further notes the current discussions surrounding the development of a national food policy, and welcomes the contribution of the convenience store sector to these discussions.

S3M-1695 SGF Healthy Living Programme (lodged on 11 April 2008) Kenneth Gibson*, Murdo Fraser*, Shona Robison*, Elaine Smith*, Robin Harper*, John Lamont*, Ted Brocklebank*, Nanette Milne*, Elizabeth Smith*, Bill Kidd*, Jamie McGrigor*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S3M-1695 SGF Healthy Living Programme (lodged on 11 April 2008) Tavish Scott*, Karen Gillon*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Margaret Mitchell*, Brian Adam*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-1695 SGF Healthy Living Programme (lodged on 11 April 2008) Sandra White*
S3M-1695 SGF Healthy Living Programme (lodged on 11 April 2008) Jamie Stone*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-1695 SGF Healthy Living Programme (lodged on 11 April 2008) Annabel Goldie*
S3M-1695 SGF Healthy Living Programme (lodged on 11 April 2008) Helen Eadie*
